The Tooltip

Position

  • top left Top left
  • top center Top center
  • top right Top right
  • bottom left Bottom left
  • bottom center Bottom center
  • bottom right Bottom right

Width

* Auto width is not compatible with position center.

  • auto width* Adjusts to the width of its content
  • fixed width Maintains its width (250 px in this case)
  • full width Adjusts to the width of its parent
